channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-15976] RegionServerMetricsWrapperRunnable will be failure when disable blockcache.
item.description:
When i disable blockcache, the code "cacheStats = blockCache.getStats();" will occur NPE in org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.MetricsRegionServerWrapperImpl.RegionServerMetricsWrapperRunnable.
It lead to many regionserver's metrics' value always equal 0.
item.summary: RegionServerMetricsWrapperRunnable will be failure when disable blockcache.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Upload a patch to fix this.

Re-upload the patch for 0.98.
This issue is also in other branches, I will upload patches to fix them.
Upload patches for other branches.

The run() already does the getStats() from blockCache. So 


 cacheStats = blockCache.getStats();

is not needed. +1 on patch

-1 overall

Thanks for reviews Ashish Singhi and ramkrishna.s.vasudevan. Pushed to master and branch-1.
Hi Andrew Purtell, Nick Dimiduk, Enis Soztutar, Sean Busbey, Mikhail Antonov, do you want this minor change for NPE to 0.98+ branches? Thanks a lot.

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-Trunk_matrix #1129 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-Trunk_matrix/1129/)
HBASE-15976 RegionServerMetricsWrapperRunnable will be failure when (jingcheng.du: rev e768c4afac059e96fae76587087cede4baa89577)

  • hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/MetricsRegionServerWrapperImpl.java
Sounds like a straightforward bug fix that should go to all branches.

SUCCESS: Integrated in HBase-1.4 #256 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-1.4/256/)
HBASE-15976 RegionServerMetricsWrapperRunnable will be failure when (jingcheng.du: rev 7a78d871d039c1471f93c4369f9885ad69a09000)

  • hbase-server/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/regionserver/MetricsRegionServerWrapperImpl.java
+1 for 0.98 thanks Jingcheng Du. I think it's a bug fix that can be checked in on all branches
Yep, sounds good. You're sure this isn't going to leave a NPE dangling someplace? I see a lot of unchecked references to cacheStats.

Thanks for pointing it out Nick Dimiduk. Most of the code check the null before using. But still one method misses that public long getBlockCacheFailedInsertions().
This is my mistake, I will add an addendum for master and branch-1, and provide new patches for other branches. Thanks.

Upload addendums for master and branch-1. Upload new patches for 0.98, branch-1.2 and branch-1.3.
The method public long getBlockCacheFailedInsertions() is not in branch-1.0 and branch-1.1, do not need new patches for both of them.

-1 overall

The issues in findbugs and unit tests seem not related with this patch.
Pushed to all 0.98+ branches. Thank you all for reviews.

And, so sorry for using a wrong message when committing patch to branch 0.98.
I wrongly added " - Addendum" to the commit message. I've reverted this commit and pushed the patch again with a correct message.
